title: Troops foil bandit attack on Benue communities, recover arms
description: Troops of Joint Task Force Operation Whirl Stroke foiled a bandit attack on communities in Katsina-Ala LGA, Benue State, and recovered arms.
description_with_more_context: Troops of Joint Task Force Operation Whirl Stroke foiled a bandit attack on communities in Katsina-Ala LGA, Benue State, and recovered arms.
